name: week-2-2-auth-middlewares
description: - working signup feature - working signin feature     - store the access token from the request in the localStorage     - use it in every pages request header

scripts.build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run start" "cd backend && npm run start"
